title: Kath Bliss
author: Kath Bliss
content: What can I do to increase my website traffic?

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well you can try to increase your web traffic with a traffic booster. It is good for ecommerce and for social media traffic.  https://traflick.com/ and www.storeya.com/public/trafficboosterKeywords and google keywords will also help. Landing pages and digital ads and then you can do email blasts with company like mail chimp. Here is a other tip you can use to increase website traffic. https://backlinko.com/increase-website-traffic#upsidedownguestpost

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: If you love to watch, then you can check out this video. https://youtu.be/WUqTm3SxZKQBut before you think of improving your site traffic, I hope your site has a catchy domain name and an enticing layout. Also, your content should be of good quality so that when you begin to gain traffic, anyone who visits your site will want to return over and over. Some people, after visiting a site and not getting or seeing what they wanted, leave and will not visit again.Also check this: How to Drive Traffic to Your Website? 20 Best Free and Paid Practices

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: mich on March 29, 2023, 08:22:39 AM...Buying website traffic is probably the worst advice you can give someone. this type of traffic is completely useless because it does not come from real people and there is no benefit from it. plus, Google views such traffic negatively and in the long term it will only harm the positioning of the site.there is one category that is used for such purposes and it is called SEO (I believe everyone is aware of it). with good SEO techniques, it is possible to increase site traffic, and that method is acceptable for search engines. if someone is already going to pay $50 a month for purchased traffic. It is certainly better to focus that budget on improving SEO, in the worst case you will get approximately the same traffic, but this time it will be visitors who are really interested in the content of that website.

comments.author: alexkut987
comments.body: try to build backlinks to your website. Read google seo tutorial will help alot.

comments.author: devil-soul
comments.body: There are several strategies you can employ to increase traffic to your website:Search engine optimization (SEO): This involves optimizing your website content for search engines, which can help increase your visibility in search results.Content marketing: Creating valuable, high-quality content that people want to read and share can help increase traffic to your website.Social media marketing: Using social media platforms to promote your website and engage with your audience can help drive traffic to your site.Pay-per-click (PPC) advertising: Paid search and social media advertising can help increase website traffic by targeting specific keywords and demographics.Guest blogging: Writing and publishing articles on other websites can help increase exposure for your website and drive traffic back to your site.Email marketing: Building an email list and sending regular newsletters or promotional emails can help bring people back to your website.Influencer marketing: Partnering with influencers in your niche or industry can help increase your website's visibility and drive traffic to your site.Remember, increasing website traffic takes time and effort, so be patient and persistent in your efforts.

comments.body: Quote from: Kath Bliss on March 29, 2023, 03:42:34 AMWhat can I do to increase my website traffic?SEO is most likely the best answer.Quote from: examplens on March 29, 2023, 12:00:01 PMthere is one category that is used for such purposes and it is called SEO (I believe everyone is aware of it). with good SEO techniques, it is possible to increase site traffic, and that method is acceptable for search engines. You should create a [ANN] Thread for your website, or even share it here.The more your website is mentioned around this forum or anywhere else  the more backlinks you receive and better will be your rank in search engines.You can take a look at the ANN of my website herehttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5445282.0

comments.author: Mikhalina Palaha
comments.body: For what? If you need build assets form blog, do it with high quality content, backlink, and promote your blog in social media or gads. I think it a long time to optimize your blog if you do self.

comments.author: Greggry
comments.body: Quote from: Kath Bliss on March 29, 2023, 03:42:34 AMWhat can I do to increase my website traffic?To be honest with you, no website will just attract traffic if your content is bad. Make your content attractive and meaningful, things like! What is the benefits of this website to subscribers? What do my content influence? Negative or positive impression, who are my target audience? Which social media should be advertise and partner with? These goods or service is this the right season for it? Who needed it most! And most important the lead topic has to be brief, unique and attractive e.g Donald Trump is in Lagos Nigeria.Or are you running ads? If not this things I mentioned matters a lot.

comments.author: meser#
comments.created_time: March 31, 2023, 03:30:29 PMLast edit: April 03, 2023, 12:37:00 PM by meser#
comments.body: Like other friends, I'm saying SEO.If you spends thousands of dollars (inorganic hits, backlinks, ads etc) on a site where you didn't set  simple SEO settings, but when you stop it, everything will be back to the way it was. And there are many tutorial videos on youtube, many articles and there are many webmaster forums which has latest news about SEO. We can give you a better idea if you specify your website (the link, software, target audience) clearly.Edit: Btw I have to add something on it.Seo isn't the only solution for increasing your web site traffic. First of all, you should determine your target audience very well and you should do a promotional work accordingly. Using Social Media and hashtags correctly will indirectly increase your website traffic eventually.Advertising your web site with Google Ads, Facebook, Twitter, İnstagram etc etc with small budget.   Finding niche platforms (web site, forums, social media accounts) and posting your services on there or collabration with that account  Organizing raffles etc.

comments.author: DrWho42
comments.body: i would recommend social media too

comments.author: CindyJones
comments.body: Build relevant backlinks to your website from niches that are similar to yours. Getting trashy or spammy backlinks might have negative impact

comments.author: Jon_Hodl
comments.body: There is no easy answer to this question.Building a solid website with decent traffic is like building a business. It can take years of hard work before you finally start to see a return on that effort. If you focus on your passion and there is a decent amount of interest in your field of work, then your passion should show through in your work and you should be able to generate solid amounts of traffic. If you're only building a website so that you can make money, then you won't likely get a whole lot of traffic because your motivations is backwards and people will be able to sense it from a poor user experience. What is your website about? Did you share a link somewhere?

comments.author: petulino
comments.body: Quote from: Kath Bliss on March 29, 2023, 03:42:34 AMWhat can I do to increase my website traffic?There are two ways to increase traffic to your website:Real: Make quality content and update it regularly. SEO is must if you want to on top in google search. This will bring good traffic to your site but remember its not easy. You have to work more than month or more.Fake: You can buy from many platform available which offer these services but i will not recommend because you will just lose your $ here and nothing real will be happen.

In the past, I have worked on a number of websites and it has been a challenge to get the traffic to my website up to the point where it is no longer in the top 10 or even the top 5.Is there a way to incres, youHow can I increase my website traffic?You can by adding a link to your website. This is a great way to increase your website traffic.Do you have any tips for improving your website traffic?There are a number of ways to increase

comments.author: james_smith77
comments.body: Increasing website traffic can be a challenging task, but there are several strategies that can help. Here are some tips to help you increase your website traffic:Optimize your website for search engines: Search engine optimization (SEO) can help your website rank higher in search engine results, increasing visibility and driving more traffic. Make sure your website's content and structure are optimized for relevant keywords and phrases.Create high-quality, shareable content: Content is king, and creating high-quality, shareable content is one of the most effective ways to attract and retain visitors. Focus on creating informative, engaging content that provides value to your target audience.Leverage social media: Social media can be a powerful tool for driving website traffic. Share your website content on social media channels, engage with your followers, and consider running social media advertising campaigns to reach a wider audience.

comments.author: rahulzx
comments.body: Quote from: Kath Bliss on March 29, 2023, 03:42:34 AMWhat can I do to increase my website traffic?search engine optimization and maintain social media accounts relevant to the your web site, consistency and be active and interacting with readers/users will be the natural way to get reach to audience
